Uses of Class
main.java.indexer.shared.models.Field

  • Packages that use Field 
    Package Description
    main.java.indexer.server.daos
    The DAOS are the database access objects and handle all Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on the Indexer Database.
    main.java.indexer.shared.communication.results
    The result classes to facilitate client-server communication.
    main.java.indexer.shared.models
    The models represent the data from the database while in memory and are used to pass information from the server to the client and vice versa.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<Field,java.lang.String> FieldDAO.readFieldsForRecord(Record record)
      Reads and returns all fields and their values for a given record from the database.
